title: Early 19th Century Sports Man-Cave RPPC - college student
author: ramram

posts.post_title: Early 19th Century Sports Man-Cave RPPC - college student
posts.post_content:
Interesting unused RPPC of a sports man-cave for an east coast college student.  Multiple pennants including Cornell, Columbia, Navy and others.  Football "Opening Game" broadside, Coke-a-Cola advertising sign, phonograph player and spittoon.  Top left looks like it could be multiple team sport photos...maybe?  

$ **ON HOLD**.   shipped (m.o. or check preferred....or Paypal f/f)

Rob M.
